letter.text: Surprise Bubba!!!!
Hehe I wanted to surprise u heaps todayy so I hope the game was a big surprise!!
Hopefully there wasn't toooo many bugs ;-;
But I want to thank the Lord for youu my sweetiepiee ~~
I'm really happy that I get to spend my valentine with someone that I care about so much c:
I really like seeing your adorable smile ...
... your rlly pretty nose ...
... and your beautiful face c:
But even more -
- I love seeing the person God has made you to be -
- seeing you sit with newcomers at church -
- working hard for other people,
- and praying for people c:
... and your beautiful face c:
And those times you cuddle me and take care of me and share with what you've been learning about God makes me rlly happy and loved!!
And so my dear bubbacino - my Tashawasha
- I thank the Lord for you -
for your faith in Jesus - more precious than gold
- for your pretty smile -
- and that you are someone who is so precious to me and shares with me the same hope in our great Lord Jesus!
And I know that ...
sometimes you have a lot on your mind a lot ...
... and things can be quite stressful for you my darling
- but our Lord who is steadfast and faithful will never forsake you nor desert you!
In Isaiah 46:4 God says to Israel -
'Even to your old age and gray hairs I am he, I am he who will sustain you. I have made you and I will carry you, I will sustain you and I will rescue you'
And our Lord promises the same for us too
- even when we get all gray and old and grumpy
- our God will never forsake us and stay with us and bring us safely home!!
Even in all the beauty and romance of valentine -
It is still only just a glimpse -
- a glimpse of the Lord's love for us!
And so happy valentine my dear baby
~~ I'm so thankful for u darling~~
From ur bubba boy ash ;)
